definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The experimental data showed that the results were better than those determined by partial least squares.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，經小波變換後處理結果回收率明顯提高。

sentences.english: In this paper, a fast algorithm for the fractal signal wavelet decomposition and reconstruction is put foreward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了分形信號的小波分解與重構的一種快速算法。

sentences.english: The theories of wavelet transform and multi-resolution analysis are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了小波變換和多分辨率分析理論。

sentences.english: A wavelet-based electrocardiogram data semi-lossless compression algorithm was proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基於小波變換的心電信號準無損壓縮算法。

sentences.english: The faults diagnosis of the gearbox were analyzed by wavelet analysis method.
sentences.chinese: 文中主要用小波分析對齒輪箱進行了故障診斷。

sentences.english: Wavelet transform and Wiener filtering are combined to denoise speech.
sentences.chinese: 將小波變換與維納濾波結合起來對語音進行去噪。

sentences.english: To understand Wang's fiction, readers need to understand the relationship between sadism and masochism .
sentences.chinese: 想要理解王小波的小說，必須首先理解虐戀情結。

sentences.english: The dimension function of NTFW was characterized by showing its definition and properties.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了規範緊框架小波的維數函數的定義和相關性質。

sentences.english: But this world there is only one Wang Xiaobo, Li Yinhe is also gone.
sentences.chinese: 可是這世上只有一個王小波，還是李銀河的，還走了。

sentences.english: The paper studies thoroughly embedded zero tree wavelet coding which is very important in digital image compression coding methods.
sentences.chinese: 並對嵌入式零樹小波編碼進行了深入的研究。

sentences.english: A blind image watermarking procedure based on the zerotree wavelet is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於零樹小波的盲圖像水印算法。

sentences.english: Two construction methods for orthonormal multiwavelets with multiplicity 2 based on scalar wavelets are given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了由單小波構造二元正交多小波的兩種方法。

sentences.english: Two construction methods for orthonormal multiwavelets with multiplicity 2 based on scalar wavelets are given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了由單小波構造二元正交多小波的兩種方法。

sentences.english: Small breakers spring up, each breaker like a large eye casting out golden sparks .
sentences.chinese: 小波浪跳躍着，每一個象個大眼睛，閃射着金光。

sentences.english: Wang xiaobo depart from Duras, and trends towards Calvino.
sentences.chinese: 王小波背離了杜拉斯，而走向了卡爾維諾。

sentences.english: Wavelet transform was applied in vibration signal extraction of hydro-pneumatic suspension.
sentences.chinese: 將小波變換應用於油氣懸架信號的提取。

definition: Wang Shuo (1958-), Chinese writer, director and actor
Acheng district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
Ba Jin (1904-2005), novelist, author of the trilogy 家, 春, 秋
(onom.) ting-a-ling (in compounds such as 玎玲 or 玲瓏|玲珑)/tinkling of gem-pendants
Liu Cixin (1963-), Chinese science fiction writer
Zhang Tianyi (1906-1985), children's writer, author of prize-winning fairy tale Secret of the Magic Gourd 寶葫蘆的秘密|宝葫芦的秘密[Bao3 hu2 lu5 de5 Mi4 mi4]
